name: Spiceychops!
description:
Spice World video game, but it's the Ghanaian film poster version.

Yesterday I saw Spice World as a(n allegedly) Ghanaian film poster, today 0hgame jam with its "Porkchops!" theme.

“These posters appeal to people because [they] invite this really incredible dialogue—a comparison between what you know of a film and how the painter imagined it. And they’re also just really good art.”

Ernie Wolfe, Los Angeles art dealer and collector

This game has no good art, just really really bad one.

Made in 0 hours, more or less.

Sorry for the lack of Mel C and Victoria, just didn't have the time to add them.
